properties.description: run dataflow for flights to small
take the FlightsFull and write FlightsSmall

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as short,
		MONTH as short,
		DAY as short,
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE as short,
		DEPARTURE_TIME as short,
		DEPARTURE_DELAY as short,
		TAXI_OUT as short,
		WHEELS_OFF as short,
		SCHEDULED_TIME as short,
		ELAPSED_TIME as short,
		AIR_TIME as short,
		DISTANCE as short,
		WHEELS_ON as short,
		TAXI_IN as short,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL as short,
		ARRIVAL_TIME as short,
		ARRIVAL_DELAY as short,
		DIVERTED as boolean,
		CANCELLED as boolean,
		CANCELLATION_REASON as string,
		AIR_SYSTEM_DELAY as short,
		SECURITY_DELAY as boolean,
		AIRLINE_DELAY as short,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as short,
		WEATHER_DELAY as short,
		id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['flights/flightsFull.csv'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> flights
flights keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> keyStream
keyStream derive(modKey = mod(id, 1000) == 5) ~> selectStream
selectStream filter(modKey) ~> filtered
filtered select(mapColumn(
		YEAR,
		MONTH,
		DAY,
		DAY_OF_WEEK,
		AIRLINE,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER,
		TAIL_NUMBER,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE,
		DEPARTURE_TIME,
		DEPARTURE_DELAY,
		TAXI_OUT,
		WHEELS_OFF,
		SCHEDULED_TIME,
		ELAPSED_TIME,
		AIR_TIME,
		DISTANCE,
		WHEELS_ON,
		TAXI_IN,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL,
		ARRIVAL_TIME,
		ARRIVAL_DELAY,
		DIVERTED,
		CANCELLED,
		CANCELLATION_REASON,
		AIR_SYSTEM_DELAY,
		SECURITY_DELAY,
		AIRLINE_DELAY,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY,
		WEATHER_DELAY,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> final
final sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flights/flightsSmall.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writer

properties.description: clean flights data, write to Parquet files

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as short,
		MONTH as short,
		DAY as short,
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE as string,
		DEPARTURE_TIME as short,
		DEPARTURE_DELAY as short,
		TAXI_OUT as short,
		WHEELS_OFF as short,
		SCHEDULED_TIME as short,
		ELAPSED_TIME as short,
		AIR_TIME as short,
		DISTANCE as short,
		WHEELS_ON as short,
		TAXI_IN as short,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL as string,
		ARRIVAL_TIME as short,
		ARRIVAL_DELAY as short,
		DIVERTED as boolean,
		CANCELLED as boolean,
		CANCELLATION_REASON as string,
		AIR_SYSTEM_DELAY as short,
		SECURITY_DELAY as boolean,
		AIRLINE_DELAY as short,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as short,
		WEATHER_DELAY as short,
		id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['flights/flightsSmall.csv'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 8)) ~> flightsCSV
flightsCSV derive(late_flight = (ARRIVAL_DELAY>30) || CANCELLED || DIVERTED) ~> isLate
departTime select(mapColumn(
		YEAR,
		MONTH,
		DAY,
		DAY_OF_WEEK,
		AIRLINE,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER,
		TAIL_NUMBER,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE,
		DEPARTURE_TIME,
		SCHEDULED_TIME,
		DISTANCE,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL,
		late_flight,
		cleanFlag,
		depart_date,
		depart_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Clone
Clone derive({500K} = mod(
    crc32(DAY,DAY_OF_WEEK,FLIGHT_NUMBER,
    TAIL_NUMBER,SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE,
    SCHEDULED_TIME,DISTANCE,SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL),
    10) == 7) ~> flag500K
flag500K filter({500K}) ~> flights500K
thinColumns derive(cleanFlag = false()) ~> cleanFlag
cleanFlag derive(depart_date = toDate(toString(YEAR)+'-'+toString(MONTH)+'-'+toString(DAY)+ ' ')) ~> departDate
isLate select(mapColumn(
		YEAR,
		MONTH,
		DAY,
		DAY_OF_WEEK,
		AIRLINE,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER,
		TAIL_NUMBER,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE,
		DEPARTURE_TIME,
		SCHEDULED_TIME,
		DISTANCE,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL,
		late_flight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> thinColumns
departDate derive(depart_time = toTimestamp(toString(depart_date) + ' ' + 
    left(iif(length(SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE) == 3, 
    '0' + SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE, SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE)
    ,2) + ':' + 
right(
    iif(length(SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE) == 3, 
    '0' + SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE, SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE)
    ,2)
 )) ~> departTime
Clone sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'5M/part[n].parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeFlights5M
flights500K sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'500K/part[n].parquet',
	mapColumn(
		YEAR,
		MONTH,
		DAY,
		DAY_OF_WEEK,
		AIRLINE,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER,
		TAIL_NUMBER,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE,
		DEPARTURE_TIME,
		SCHEDULED_TIME,
		DISTANCE,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL,
		late_flight,
		cleanFlag,
		depart_date,
		depart_time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> write500K

source(output(
		YEAR as short,
		MONTH as short,
		DAY as short,
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE as short,
		SCHEDULED_TIME as short,
		DISTANCE as short,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL as short,
		{late-flight} as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/flights5K/*']) ~> source
source sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['temp/junk.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkhole
